metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9578 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In devs.c in Yubico libu2f-host before 1.1.8, the response to init is misparsed, leaking uninitialized stack memory back to the device.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-9578` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libu2f-host0 - 1.1.9-1
libu2f-udev - 1.1.9-1
u2f-host - 1.1.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libu2f-host package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.9-1').
